title: Brightspace scripts course configuration
description: The schema of Brightspace scripts application configuration data for a specific course.

course.description: The internal course name for course plugin and course specific data selection.

assignmentDefaults.description: The defaults for assignments if not overwritten on an individual basis.

assignments.description: The collection of assignments tied to this course, where keys are assignment identifiers.

graders.description: The collection of graders tied to this course, where keys are grader identifiers.

email.description: The email of the grader to which distributed assignments are sent.

contactEmail.description: The email advertised to students which they can use to contact the grader (if different from the distribution email).

assignmentDefaults.title: Default assignment configuration schema
assignmentDefaults.description: The schema that describes the defaults for assignment configurations.

ignoredSubmissions.description: A list of entity names of which to ignore submissions.

draftFeedback.description: Specifies whether feedback is uploaded to Brightspace in a draft or published state.

defaultCodeBlockLanguage.description: The default code block language to use for Markdown style code blocks in the feedback.

fileHierarchy.description: Specifies how the file hierarchy in each submission is processed.

division.description: Specifies how the assignment is divided over the graders.

gradeAliases.description: Mapping of aliases to numeric grade strings or symbols which graders can use as a shorthand notation.

removeFiles.description: A list of glob-like file names to remove from submissions.

removeFolders.description: A list of glob-like folder names to remove from submissions.

assignment.title: Assignment configuration schema
assignment.description: The schema that describes assignment configurations, which may overwrite fields from the default configuration.

name.description: The name of the Brightspace DropBox folder assignment.

encryptionPassword.description: Password for FileSender encryption. Transfers will be encrypted with this password. Should contain at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one digit, and one special character.

division.title: Division schema
division.description: The schema that describes how an assignment is divided over the graders.

groupCategoryName.description: The Brightspace grader group category name, or persistent group name.

groupMapping.description: Mapping of Brightspace grader group name to grader identifier.

graderWeights.description: Mapping of grader identifier to grading workload weight. For random division, this is optional - graders not specified will get weight 1.0. For persistent division, all graders must be specified.
